value:
Still not sure what a mercenary like
me is doing here, but hey—I'm up for
any opportunity to get stronger.

The mercenary group I belonged to
got wiped out not long ago. Honestly,
I was overwhelmed by that defeat.

I'm good at fighting on the front lines,
but you seem like you've got a good
eye for tactics. I'm counting on you.

Hey, I've been having strange dreams
lately. Know any weirdos who might
have an idea about this kind of stuff?

The food here is incredible. Do you
think I could get someone to cook for
us next time we're on a mission?

You $Nu?$k$pI was sent over here to say hi, on
$Nf's request.
I'm getting stronger!
Yeah, not bad.
Wait, that's it?!
This'll help me break new boundaries.

I'm Shez. A mercenary. Now that
you've hired me, I'll do the job I'm
paid for. So, who are we fighting?

Feels like I've been here awhile now,
somehow or other...$k$pOh, don't get me wrong—it's not like
I hate it here or anything. I'm grateful
for this chance to get stronger.$k$pAnd of course, I've enjoyed working
with you. Enough that I'd be happy to
stick around for as long as you want.$k$pBut...someday, I'm going to go back
to Fódlan. There's this voice in my
head telling me I have to.$k$pWhen I do, that'll be goodbye. But
until then, I'll use my blade to cut a
path for you. That's my job, after all.
I'm not gonna die here!
Here it comes!
You're done!
So much for you!
No... I failed...
Swordsmanship? Mostly self-taught. There's nobody I could point to and say, "that's my teacher."
*yelp* Is poking people what you consider a good time?
On the battlefield, you have to keep moving. Stop and you pin a target on your back.
This? It's a Merc Whistle. We use it to find each other on the battlefield. Can't get by without it.
I don't know where I was born or who my parents are. I've been alone a long time.
I should probably get some sleep while I can...
Just remember, I've got your back. So stay in the thick of things!
Oh, sure.
What now?
Leave it to me.
